text: tam'ma odeyana adesa palisidavarige hitavide. Atta, avana adesagalannu ullanghisidavara bali, bhumiyalliruvudellavu iddu, heccuvariyagi matte aste iddu, adannella avaru pariharavagi nididaru, avara vicaraneya phalitansavu tumba kettadagiruvudu. Narakave avara neleyagiruvudu mattu adu tumba ketta vasasthanavagide
